newsitem.title: USA: MAPCO sets NGL transporation venture.
newsitem.headline: MAPCO sets NGL transporation venture.

text.p: MAPCO Inc said it reached an understanding with privately owned Enterprise Products Co to form a joint venture for the development of a natural gas liquids transportation and distribution system.

It is anticipated this system will be capable of distributing product from key NGL sources in southern Louisiana with direct connections to major NGL markets, including the Louisiana river markets, Lake Charles, La., and Mont Belvieu, Texas.
The venture will be a limited liability company in which MAPCO and Enterprise will each have a 50 percent interest.
MAPCO also said Peter A. Fasullo has joined the company as vice president of business development and strategic planning.
Most recently he was senior vice president of corporate development for Valero Energy Corp.
